refnamediv.refpurpose: Change the priority of the current process

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: proc_nice changes the priority of the current process. If an errno occurs, like the user lacks permission to change the priority, an error of level E_WARNING is generated and &false; is returned. Otherwise, &true; is returned.

note.para: proc_nice will only exist if your system has NICE capabilities. NICE conforms to: SVr4, SVID EXT, AT&T, X/OPEN, BSD 4.3. So, for example, proc_nice is not available in Windows.
